turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good, how are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could help me with putting an order in at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you put an order in at the Starbucks in Dresher, Pennsylvania on Virginia Drive?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HOw do you spell that city?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: d r e s h e r, PA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, thank you and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrup or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whip cream, but it can have the caramel drizzle syrup on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what milk would you like to use to make it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, I have a venti caramel macchiatto with soy milk and the carmel drizzle on top, from the starbucks on Virginia Drive in Dresher,PA.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct. But can you change the the temperature of the of the milk from steamed to extra hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. I"ll include a note that you want it extra hot instead of steamed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good day and enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I will.
